Description: A microfluidic device by 10x Genomics used for single-cell partitioning and barcoding, enabling high-throughput single-cell RNA sequencing and other applications.
An advanced instrument by 10x Genomics designed for high-throughput single-cell applications, offering improved hardware robustness and scalability for large-scale studies.
A cost-effective version of the Chromium X series by 10x Genomics, providing automated single-cell partitioning and barcoding with the option to upgrade to full Chromium X capabilities.
A lower-throughput, cost-effective instrument by 10x Genomics for single-cell analysis, upgradable to the high-throughput Chromium X with a software update.

A mass cytometry platform by Standard BioTools (formerly Fluidigm) that enables high-dimensional analysis of single cells by measuring multiple parameters simultaneously using metal-tagged antibodies.

A mass cytometry instrument by Standard BioTools (formerly Fluidigm) that allows for comprehensive phenotyping of cells by detecting multiple markers with high sensitivity using metal-conjugated antibodies.
An imaging mass cytometry system by Standard BioTools (formerly Fluidigm) that combines mass cytometry with imaging to provide spatially resolved, high-dimensional analysis of tissue sections.
A high-throughput sequencing system by Illumina capable of generating large volumes of DNA sequence data, suitable for a wide range of genomic applications.
A desktop sequencing system by Illumina offering flexible, high-throughput sequencing for various applications, including whole-genome, exome, and transcriptome sequencing.
A scalable, high-throughput sequencing system by Illumina designed for large-scale genomic projects, providing flexibility across a range of applications with high data output.
The latest high-throughput sequencing platform by Illumina, offering increased speed, scalability, and cost efficiency for large-scale genomic studies.
A spatial genomics instrument by 10x Genomics that facilitates the transfer of tissue samples onto Visium slides, enabling spatial gene expression profiling.
An in situ analysis platform by 10x Genomics that allows for high-resolution mapping of gene expression within tissue sections, providing spatial context to molecular data.
